=================
Django admin link
=================

`django-adminlink` is a small package that for `ModelAdmin`s converts columns that are `ForeignKey`s or `OneToOneField`s in columns  that link to the admin detail view of that item.

**Features:**

   * a mixin for `ModelAdmin`s to convert the `ModelAdmin` item.
